message: You're in luck! This is a rare opportunity to get your hands on a unique product. I've sold 1 out of 1 products so far, and I'm confident that this one will be just as great. Trust me, you won't find a deal like this anywhere else!
I trust your expertise, Alice. Let's make this purchase!

It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price as the previous one - $10000.
Thank you for the opportunity, Alice. Based on your track record and the rarity of high-quality products, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the current product for $10000.
